# Working with Data ğŸ“Š

## Pandas DataFrame

```python_not
import pandas as pd

# Read data
df = pd.read_csv('data.csv')

# Explore
print(df.head())
print(df.info())
print(df.describe())
```

## Common Operations

| Operation | Method |
|-----------|--------|
| Select columns | df['col'] |
| Filter rows | df[df['col'] > 5] |
| Group by | df.groupby('col') |
| Merge | pd.merge() |

> ğŸ’¡ Pandas is your data workhorse!

# Functions and Classes ğŸ”§

## Functions

```python
def calculate_mean(data):
    return sum(data) / len(data)

result = calculate_mean([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])
print(result)  # 3.0
```

## Classes

```python
class DataProcessor:
    def __init__(self, data):
        self.data = data
    
    def clean(self):
        # cleaning logic
        pass
```
